title: Will UAE’s Unity Hold Up? ‘We’re Not Going to Lose the Giro by Fighting Each Other’
content:
UAE’s ‘Three Musketeers’ strategy is paying off so far in the Giro d'Italia: 'We will race to keep the pink jersey on the team and win the Giro.'

Read the full article at Will UAE’s Unity Hold Up? ‘We’re Not Going to Lose the Giro by Fighting Each Other’ on Velo.
author: ahood
